cursorMode.name: cursorMode
cursorMode.description[zh_CN]: 设置为TRUE以启用wacom相对模式
cursorMode.description: Set this to TRUE to enable wacom relative mode

mapOutput.name: mapOutput
mapOutput.description[zh_CN]: 将数位板输入区域映射到指定输出
mapOutput.description: Map the tablet's input area to a given output

suppress.name: suppress
suppress.description[zh_CN]: 设置输入坐标变化的阈值，范围0-100
suppress.description: Set the delta cutoff level for further processing of incoming input tool coordinate values

forceProportions.name: forceProportions
forceProportions.description[zh_CN]: 强制绘图表面的比例与屏幕纵横比匹配
forceProportions.description: Force the proportions of the drawing surface to match the aspect ratio of your screen

mouseEnterRemap.name: mouseEnterRemap
mouseEnterRemap.description[zh_CN]: 当鼠标进入新屏幕时重新映射
mouseEnterRemap.description: Remap when mouse enter new screen

keyUpAction.name: keyUpAction
keyUpAction.description: Set action mapping for up button

keyDownAction.name: keyDownAction
keyDownAction.description: Set action mapping for down button

stylusThreshold.name: stylusThreshold
stylusThreshold.description[zh_CN]: 生成按键事件所需的最小压力，范围1-2047
stylusThreshold.description: The minimum pressure to generate a Button event, range 1-2047

stylusRawSample.name: stylusRawSample
stylusRawSample.description[zh_CN]: 输入工具原始数据点的采样窗口大小，范围1-20
stylusRawSample.description: Set the sample window size for incoming input tool raw data points, range 1-20

eraserThreshold.name: eraserThreshold
eraserThreshold.description[zh_CN]: 橡皮擦生成按键事件所需的最小压力，范围1-2047
eraserThreshold.description: The minimum pressure to generate a Button event for eraser, range 1-2047

eraserRawSample.name: eraserRawSample
eraserRawSample.description[zh_CN]: 橡皮擦原始数据点的采样窗口大小，范围1-20
eraserRawSample.description: Set the sample window size for eraser raw data points, range 1-20
